meanings.definition: A sailing ship with three or more masts, square-rigged on the foremast and fore-and-aft rigged on the other masts.
meanings.sent1: The majestic barquentine sailed gracefully across the ocean.
meanings.sent2: The crew worked together to raise the sails on the barquentine.
meanings.sent3: The playful dolphins swam alongside the barquentine, showing off their acrobatic skills.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a barquentine, navigating through the sea of knowledge.
meanings.sent5: The sun set behind the silhouette of the barquentine, painting the sky in hues of orange and pink.
